articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: India records first suspected mpox case, male patient in isolation - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The health ministry says the young patient recently travelled from a country experiencing the virus outbreak.
articles.content:
Indias health ministry says it has recorded a suspected case of mpox found in a man who recently travelled from a country suffering an outbreak of the virus.
The young male patient has been isolated… [+2057 chars]
